WELCOME TO VISTA INVEST

Vista Invest has established an esteemed reputation over the last 15 years for identifying wealth building opportunities on an international level. Offering only the top performing asset classes in property and alternative investments to ensure maximum satisfaction is delivered. Whether you are looking for a traditional UK buy to let or a hassle free alternative investment. We can offer the right opportunities tailored to your individual investment needs, helping you reach your lifestyle and financial goals. The aim is to offer assured returns on your investments with the focus being solely on Yield, Growth, Security and Exit.

UK OFF MARKET INVESTMENTS

The term ‘off market’ is a much sought after term in the property industry, as ‘off market’ signifies a property that is not openly advertised to the general public. Through our extensive network of contacts we have exclusive access to properties which are completely off market and are offered at discounted rates to current market prices. These properties are in key investment areas with maximum investment opportunity based on a mixture of income generation and capital growth.

GOLD

Purchase the most established and respected store of wealth in the world with a fixed profit of 6% in just 3 months with the option to renew, withdraw or compound. From just 1,000 (GBP, USD, EUR) with no exposure to market fluctuations.

UK RESIDENTIAL INVESTMENTS

• Key Investment areas offered • Entry levels from £115,000 • Fixed returns starting at 7% p.a • Rental guarantees offered for minimum of 3 years • Full due diligence with proven track records provided • Maximum growth potential • Fully tenanted properties available • Developer Buy Back options available

LOAN NOTES

How to invest in property without buying a house: Loan Notes have become a popular form of investment since global economic crisis in 2008 & are a great way to invest in real estate with low entry levels and above market average returns.
